contest-event.event-date:
June 11, 1887 D Blackpool Contest
Blackpool Contest 0 Test Piece Contest Blackpool Contest blackpool-contest
Cinq Mars [arr. Godfrey]
Raikes Hall Gardens, Blackpool 20 bands entered, 9 competed Prizes: £30, £20, £15, £10, £7, £5. 6 winning bands had to attend once each to give a concert (two bands each subsequent Saturday) and receive £15 until July 6th when all 6 would play for a prize of £20. Each unsuccessful band would receive £5. Test piece on July 6 was 'Victory'.
Dec. 29, 2011, 10:47 p.m. May 11, 2019, 8:56 p.m.
1 Oldham Rifles Band Alexander Owen
2 Heywood Rifles Band John Gladney Jnr
3 Besses o' th' Barn Alexander Owen
4 Hanley Mission Alexander Owen
5 Bolton (Hoover) Band S. Gilberthorpe
6 Nelson Brass Band Alexander Owen
Unknown Result Wincham Old Temperance J.T. Candlin
Unknown Result Bury Borough Alexander Owen
Unknown Result Batley Old Benjamin Denton Jackson
